data.actual_result: When you log out and restart app, all local data is wiped and everything is reset as if you just uninstalled and reinstalled Discord
data.expected_result: Discord should keep your settings after logging out and back in ; it should reset them only if you log in with a different account
data.short_description: Logging out and restarting the app clears all local data
data.steps_to_repro: - Edit some settings and do things to add stuff to your local data : edit notification settings, voice settings, accept some NSFW warnings, fill out Frequently Used emojis section, make message search in servers to create search history entries, etc - Go to your settings and Log Out - Force-close Discord - Log in again - Check your settings, frequently used emojis, and everything else you edited at step 1 - If necessary, restart the app again
